scripts.//base_scripts: the building blocks of commandscripts go here
scripts.//test-workaround: //force vite to prebundle deps as this is needed for chromium to function correctly in tests
scripts.//command_scripts: the compositions of base_scripts go here
scripts.lint: npm run types && npm run prettier && npm run eslint && npm run jscpd
scripts._test: npm run test-workaround && wtr **/*.test.tsx --node-resolve --playwright --browsers firefox chromium
